root.name: Need for Speed: Carbon - Own the City
root.description: OverviewNeed for Speed: Carbon - Own the City is the portable version of Need for Speed: Carbon with the lead platform for Own the City being the PSP. Unlike Need for Speed Carbon on consoles, the Touge-style canyon racing is not included.StoryThe game is set in fictional city named Coast City. After a street race that resulted in your brothers death you set out to find who caused it. With the help of a few friends you race to take over the city and find out the one behind it.PSNNeed for Speed Carbon Own the City is listed on PSN USA as simply "Need for Speed: Carbon". The "Own the City" part of the name is omitted, even though the thumbnail shows the full name.Need for Speed Carbon Own the City can be purchased from PSN USA for $19.99 and the filesize is listed as 810 MB.The game is supported by Playstation Vita according to the cheapassgamer.com forum community.
